results.title: Morehu
results.brief_description: Rita Morrison’s mother died three days after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. Her grief would link these two events forever. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.
results.description: Rita Morrison’s mother died three days after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. Her grief would link these two events forever. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: My wardrobe door
results.brief_description: Nadia Rose’s wardrobe door is full of photo’s of her friends and family. It keeps them close to her even when she is far away. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: The old man
results.creator_credit: Koorie Heritage Trust and Lee Stewart
results.brief_description: Lee Stewart pays tribute to his father who coached the local football team and was an inspiration to his sons and his players. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: Old and new
results.brief_description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Without a doubt
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Lyn Skillern and ACMI
results.brief_description: John Rouse, a kind and fun loving man from Yorkshire loved to dress as Santa and even had his own catch phrase, ‘without a doubt’. His daughter-in-law Lyn Skillern and her family remember and pay tribute to him.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Lyn Skillern and ACMI

results.title: A Mission from Dog
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Shirlee McPherson and ACMI
results.brief_description: Like Shirlee McPherson, her partner Dennis has always loved dogs, which led them to rescuing a neglected border collie and her litter of pups.

results.title: A Chance decision
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Graham Goulding and ACMI
results.brief_description: A chance decision led Graham Goulding into a teaching job in China where the banquets were endless and he and his colleagues were treated like royalty. A unique adventure that has remained with Goulding long after his return to Gippsland.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Graham Goulding and ACMI
results.description: A chance decision led Graham Goulding into a teaching job in China where the banquets were endless and he and his colleagues were treated like royalty. A unique adventure that has remained with Goulding long after his return to Gippsland.

results.title: In a galaxy far far away  - me and my game
results.brief_description: Born and raised in Mildura, 15 year old Justyn Smith loves to play video games. It keeps him out of trouble and besides roaming around the streets of Mildura is boring anyway! This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.brief_description: Nick Casey loves his pop who looks after his whole family and taught him how to catch fish. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: Moulamain dreaming
results.brief_description: Naomi Edwards lives in Mildura but dreams of going back to Moulamain to live with her grandparents and mum and dad. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.
